resources.string:
"Okufanele uhlale ukukhumbula:
"
"Ukufana kobuso kuvikeleke kancane kunephethini, iphinikhodi, noma iphasiwedi.
"
Omunye ofana nawe angavula ithebhulethi yakho."
"
Idatha esetshenziswe ukubona ubuso bakho igcinwa iyimfihlo kuthebhulethi."
"

" "
"Thola indawo esendliniâ€”engakhanyi kakhulu noma engemnyama kakhulu.
"
Bamba ucingo luqondane nehlo."
"
Ithebhulethi yakho ivula ngokushesha uma ikubona.
Uma ithebhulethi yakho ingaboni ubuso bakho, ungavuma ngephethini, iphinikhodi, noma iphasiwedi yakho.

"Izibonelo:
"
"Ezibanini ezahlukene
"
Ngezibuko noma ngaphandle kwazibuko ezichasisiwe"
"
Kunentshebe noma kushefiwe"
"" Bamba ithebhulethi iqondane nehlo."
